text: Not as reliable but for the time being you might just be able to check and see if the alt contains “stock” and not add it if it does.
I suspect that will get the majority of the cases
Unfortunately most marketers just upload images with IMG_82629.jpg names
Ahhhh I understand the issue now. I misinterpreted it as auto uploaded stock imagery or something was doing this. But it’s just defaulting alt text to the file name on upload.
